original_title: Pay Up Cheaters: The Story of the Beat Farmers
overview: A documentary about legendary San Diego-based, roots rock band, THE BEAT FARMERS featuring interviews with members Jerry Raney, Joey Harris, Buddy Blue, Rolle Love, and Country Dick Montana, plus Dwight Yoakam, Dave Alvin, Harry Shearer, Dr. Demento, and Mojo Nixon (among others).
title: Pay Up Cheaters: The Story of the Beat Farmers
